Package com.salesforce.multicloudj.iam.driver

Class AbstractIam

java.lang.Object
com.salesforce.multicloudj.iam.driver.AbstractIam
All Implemented Interfaces:
Provider, Identity, AutoCloseable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AwsIam, GcpIam
public abstract class AbstractIam extends Object implements Provider, Identity, AutoCloseable
Abstract base class for Identity and Access Management (IAM) implementations. This class is internal for SDK and all the providers for IAM implementations are supposed to implement it.

This provides a unified interface for managing identities (roles/service accounts) and policies across different cloud providers including AWS IAM, GCP IAM, and AliCloud RAM.

    • createIdentity

      public String createIdentity(String identityName, String description, String tenantId, String region, Optional<TrustConfiguration> trustConfig, Optional<CreateOptions> options)
      Creates a new identity (role or service account) in the cloud provider.
      Specified by:
      createIdentity in interface Identity
      Parameters:
      identityName - the name of the identity to create
      description - a description of the identity's purpose
      tenantId - the tenant/project/account ID
      region - the region where the identity should be created
      trustConfig - optional trust configuration (trust policy/principals)
      options - optional creation options (path, max session duration, etc.)
      Returns:
      the unique identifier (ARN, ID, etc.) of the created identity

    • doCreateIdentity

      protected abstract String doCreateIdentity(String identityName, String description, String tenantId, String region, Optional<TrustConfiguration> trustConfig, Optional<CreateOptions> options)
      Creates a new identity (role/service account) in the cloud provider. Provider-specific implementations should override this method.
      Parameters:
      identityName - the name of the identity to create
      description - optional description for the identity (can be null)
      tenantId - the tenant ID (AWS Account ID, GCP Project ID, or AliCloud Account ID)
      region - the region for IAM operations
      trustConfig - optional trust configuration
      options - optional creation options
      Returns:
      the unique identifier of the created identity

    • doAttachInlinePolicy

      protected abstract void doAttachInlinePolicy(PolicyDocument policyDocument, String tenantId, String region, String resource)
      Attaches an inline policy to a resource. Provider-specific implementations should override this method.
      Parameters:
      policyDocument - the policy document in substrate-neutral format
      tenantId - the tenant ID
      region - the region
      resource - the resource to attach the policy to

    • doGetInlinePolicyDetails

      protected abstract String doGetInlinePolicyDetails(String identityName, String policyName, String roleName, String tenantId, String region)
      Retrieves the details of a specific inline policy attached to an identity. Provider-specific implementations should override this method.
      Parameters:
      identityName - the identity name
      policyName - the policy name (optional and subject to cloud semantics)
      roleName - the role name (optional and subject to cloud semantics)
      tenantId - the tenant ID
      region - the region
      Returns:
      the policy document details as a string

    • doGetAttachedPolicies

      protected abstract List<String> doGetAttachedPolicies(String identityName, String tenantId, String region)
      Lists all inline policies attached to an identity. Provider-specific implementations should override this method.
      Parameters:
      identityName - the identity name
      tenantId - the tenant ID
      region - the region
      Returns:
      a list of policy names

    • doRemovePolicy

      protected abstract void doRemovePolicy(String identityName, String policyName, String tenantId, String region)
      Removes an inline policy from an identity. Provider-specific implementations should override this method.
      Parameters:
      identityName - the name of the identity
      policyName - the name of the policy to remove
      tenantId - the tenant ID
      region - the region

    • doDeleteIdentity

      protected abstract void doDeleteIdentity(String identityName, String tenantId, String region)
      Deletes an identity from the cloud provider. Provider-specific implementations should override this method.
      Parameters:
      identityName - the name of the identity to delete
      tenantId - the tenant ID
      region - the region

    • doGetIdentity

      protected abstract String doGetIdentity(String identityName, String tenantId, String region)
      Retrieves metadata about an identity. Provider-specific implementations should override this method.
      Parameters:
      identityName - the name of the identity
      tenantId - the tenant ID
      region - the region
      Returns:
      the unique identity identifier (ARN, email, or roleId)
